name: Outlook Unread Highlighter
description: This makes the background of unread messages in the list a certain color so you can actually see them.
additional_info:
1.09 - Changed screenshot

1.08 - Fixed today's bug (10-26-17) that caused messages to become hidden.

1.07 - Almost imperceptibly changed default color to be slightly greener. Changed title.

1.05 - Still not guaranteed to work elsewhere but added option to change unread background color.

1.0 - Initial Release. Functionality specifically designed for Point Park University Outlook, may not work on other Outlooks.
